title: Is Napoleon Bonaparte an INTJ or ENTJ? - Quora

response.answer_text: Napoleon was almost certainly an INTJ and not an ENTJ. He became a brilliant and charismatic leader as he entered his prime, but he was a shy and awkward kid who was a loner and a voracious reader. He was a very thoughtful person who, though he wouldn’t hesitate to take action when opportunity presented itself, was very considerate and calculating. He was not ‘ready, fire, aim’. His headmaster, Abbé Chardon: “(Napoleon was) a thoughtful and gloomy character. He had no playmate and walked about by himself.” Chevalier de Kéralio, the under-inspector of the his military school described him as: “docile expression, mild, straight-forward, thoughtful” “I didn’t now how to smile or play like the others.” - Napoleon I could go on because there’s plenty more evidence, but I’ll stop here.
